name: Beach Cleanup
description:
A local environmental group has offered to clean the beach
Will you accept?

name: No Visitors?
description: Business is particularily slow today, you lose some popularity

name: Public Holiday
description: It's a public holiday! Crowds flock to your beach

name: Climate Proposal
description:
A local climate activism groups asks for you
to preserve a section of your beach for local wildlife
Do you accept?

name: Climate Loan
description:
The climate group asks for some money as a loan
to purchase some fencing and other habitat equipment
Do you accept?

name: Climate Boycott
description:
The climate group starts boycotting your beach
saying that you hate the climate
Will you chase them out or do nothing?

name: Rock Concert
description:
A local rock band called Muskets and Tulips asks if they can perform in your beach
Do you accept?
